name: Scruffy The Bandit, The Game!
description:
Scruffy is up to his usual mischief: kidnapping!

Help him find his tape and some damsels to spirit away in his van. You'll have to be quick on your feet to avoid the authorities and traffic if you want to set a new high score!

Press "X" to start the game. Use the arrow keys to  control Scruffy. Press "Enter" to bring up the pause menu and restart the game after a loss.
